Flow.description: 08May23 - CC(SDA) - assign user from new selection 07May23 - CC(SDA) - final adjustment to use Pass sheet prior to completing pass 05May23 - CC(SDA) - do not select reps (for APAC launch) - cannot use until all sales reps onboard Org2 03May23 - CC(SDA) - exclude inactive Opp Rec Types from picklist 6/7 demo feedback

formulas.name: calcMeetingTime
formulas.expression: DATETIMEVALUE( LEFT(TEXT( {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}+(30/1440) ),14) + CASE( ROUND(VALUE(MID(TEXT( {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}+(30/1440)),15,2))/30,0), 1, '30', '00') + ':00Z' ) + IF( ROUND(VALUE(MID(TEXT( {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime} +(30/1440)),15,2))/30,0) = 4, 1/24, 0)
